resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.description: Developed resilience to endure more hits in battle by increasing armor.

loneWolf.name: Lone Wolf
loneWolf.description: You got better when fighting alone. Increase accuracy and dodge.

combatAwareness.name: Combat Awareness
combatAwareness.description: Heightened awareness allows you to anticipate and evade attacks.

healingAura.name: Healing Aura
healingAura.description: Continuously heals all allies in range.

keenEyes.name: Keen Eyes
keenEyes.description: Your sharp vision allows you to spot weak points and strike with greater precision.

guardianProtocol.name: Guardian Protocol
guardianProtocol.description: When critically damaged, the Sentry initiates a last-stand defense, boosting its power.

lightfooted.name: Lightfooted
lightfooted.description: Your nimble movements make you harder to hit and allow you to strike more quickly.

opportunist.name: Opportunist

effects.name: Opportunist
effects.description: Deal 10% increased damage to enemies suffering from negative status effects (e.g., stun, bleed, poison).

opportunist.description: You excel at exploiting weaknesses, dealing increased damage to foes hindered by status effects.

poisonResistanceBasic.name: Basic Poison Resistance

effects.description: Grants 10 flat resistance to Poison damage.

poisonResistanceBasic.description: Developed a tolerance to common poisons, reducing their effectiveness.

weaponMastery.name: Weapon Mastery
weaponMastery.description: Extensive training with various melee weapons has honed your combat prowess, increasing damage.

effects.name: Weapon Mastery
effects.description: Deal 10% increased damage with melee weapons.

toughness.name: Toughness
toughness.description: Your body has become hardened, increasing your maximum health and resilience to damage.

armorExpertise.name: Armor Expertise
armorExpertise.description: You know how to wear armor for maximum protection, increasing the effectiveness of all your equipment stats by 10%.

effects.description: Increases all equipment stat bonuses by 10%.

battleHardened.name: Battle Hardened
battleHardened.description: Numerous battles have steeled your resolve, making you more resistant to fear and stuns.

effects.description: Increases Fear resistance by 25% and Stun resistance by 15%.

spellPower.name: Spell Power
spellPower.description: Your innate connection to magical energies is stronger, boosting your overall spell power.

manaFont.name: Mana Font
manaFont.description: You are a wellspring of magical energy, possessing a larger mana pool and faster regeneration.

elementalAttunement.name: Elemental Attunement
elementalAttunement.description: A basic understanding of elemental forces grants minor resistance to all primary elemental damage types.

effects.description: Increases resistance to all elemental damage types by 5%.

arcaneFocus.name: Arcane Focus
arcaneFocus.description: Intense concentration on the arcane arts enhances the power and efficiency of your Arcane spells.

divineGrace.name: Divine Grace
divineGrace.description: A touch of divine favor enhances your healing abilities and occasionally bestows a minor protective blessing on those you mend.

holyMight.name: Holy Might
holyMight.description: Your divine power infuses your offensive spells, increasing their Holy damage.

faithUnwavering.name: Faith Unwavering
faithUnwavering.description: Your steadfast faith makes you highly resistant to fear and charm, and empowers your abilities when your spiritual reserves are low.
